languages.text: {n}Каллигос растекается в улыбке.{/n} "Я кое о чем слыхал, новеньк{mf|ий|ая}. О чем-то, что меня впечатлило".
{n}A slow grin cuts across Calligos's face.{/n} "I have heard things, new blood. Things that have impressed me."
languages.original_text: {n}Каллигос растекается в улыбке.{/n} "Я кое о чем слыхал, новеньк{mf|ий|ая}. О чем-то, что меня впечатлило".

languages.text: {n}Un sourire s'épanouit lentement sur le visage de Calligos.{/n} « J'ai entendu des rumeurs, novice. Des rumeurs qui n'ont pas laissé de m'impressionner. »
languages.original_text: {n}A slow grin cuts across Calligos's face.{/n} "I have heard things, new blood. Things that have impressed me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un sourire s'épanouit lentement sur le visage de Calligos.{/n} « J'ai entendu des rumeurs, novice. Des rumeurs qui n'ont pas laissé de m'impressionner. »
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: {n}Una sonrisa se extiende lentamente por el rostro de Calligos.{/n} «He oído cosas, novat{mf|o|a}. Cosas que me han impresionado».
languages.original_text: {n}A slow grin cuts across Calligos's face.{/n} "I have heard things, new blood. Things that have impressed me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una sonrisa se extiende lentamente por el rostro de Calligos.{/n} «He oído cosas, novat{mf|o|a}. Cosas que me han impresionado».
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: {n}カリゴスの顔にゆっくりと笑みが浮かぶ。{/n}「新たな血よ、事態は耳にはしている。まあまあ感銘を受けたよ」
languages.original_text: {n}A slow grin cuts across Calligos's face.{/n} "I have heard things, new blood. Things that have impressed me."

traits.locale_text: {n}カリゴスの顔にゆっくりと笑みが浮かぶ。{/n}「新たな血よ、事態は耳にはしている。まあまあ感銘を受けたよ」
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: {n}卡里戈斯脸上缓缓露出了笑容。{/n}“我听说了某些事情，你给我留下了深刻的印象，新来的。”
languages.original_text: {n}A slow grin cuts across Calligos's face.{/n} "I have heard things, new blood. Things that have impressed me."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡里戈斯脸上缓缓露出了笑容。{/n}“我听说了某些事情，你给我留下了深刻的印象，新来的。”
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: {n}Calligos verzieht sein Gesicht zu einem breiten Grinsen.{/n} "Ich habe Dinge gehört, Neuling. Dinge, die mich beeindruckt haben."
languages.original_text: {n}A slow grin cuts across Calligos's face.{/n} "I have heard things, new blood. Things that have impressed me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos verzieht sein Gesicht zu einem breiten Grinsen.{/n} "Ich habe Dinge gehört, Neuling. Dinge, die mich beeindruckt haben."
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: {n}Calligos'un yüzüne yavaşça bir sırıtış yayılıyor.{/n} "Bazı şeyler duydum taze kan. Beni etkileyen şeyler."
languages.original_text: {n}A slow grin cuts across Calligos's face.{/n} "I have heard things, new blood. Things that have impressed me."
